alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Calcasieu; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 11:44AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Beauregard, western Calcasieu and Vernon Parishes, north central Jefferson, Newton, Orange and southeastern Jasper Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1143 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Hornbeck to near Newton to Lakeview. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Sulphur, Orange, Vidor, De Ridder, Leesville, Vinton, Newton, Rosepine, Merryville, Anacoco, Singer, Sugartown, Toledo Bend Dam, Fields, Bon Weir, Burkeville, Deweyville, Fort Polk and De Quincy. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 880 and 858. Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central, southwestern and west central Louisiana...and southeastern Texas.
